message_1:
A student needs to calculate the Euler characteristic of the tangent bundle of the two-dimensional sphere. 

The student can use the fact that the Euler characteristic of the tangent bundle of an even-dimensional sphere is 2, and the Euler characteristic of the tangent bundle of an odd-dimensional sphere is 0.
message_2:
Since the student is working with a two-dimensional sphere (S^2), it is an even-dimensional sphere. According to the given fact, the Euler characteristic of the tangent bundle of an even-dimensional sphere is 2.

Therefore, the Euler characteristic of the tangent bundle of the two-dimensional sphere (S^2) is 2.
